reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater vest chic with its sleeveless design and appreciate its great quality, comfort, and softness.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love lightweight fabric, super bright green, washed/dry still vibrant color/perfect fit
items.body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: Loved ðŸ’š the bright GREEN color, & stylish cap sleeve Flattering: The cut of the cap sleeves is perfect and very flattering for my body type. Iâ€™m larger up top, med waste, skinny thighs/legs - and my arms need more workouts lol so this is the most flattering style/cut for my body! Softness: this was super soft - already washed (cool water, no chemical detergents) and, hang to dry for the 1st wash Fit: after washing no shrinkage Quality: always wash in cool water & hang to dry for the 1st time, when thereâ€™s no shrinkage, it shows the quality is there, definitely color stayed intact very vibrant green, still has the softness & no issues with the fabric whatsoever. Comfort: Super comfortable and cool itâ€™s a lightweight fabric meant for summertime in Florida where itâ€™s super hot. I think all these tops get the misconception when they say sweater. They are all lightweight, soft sweaters that can be paired with cut off jean shorts for casual, and/or paired with skinny jeans, dressed up w/high heels for date night ðŸ’‹ - they are not meant for warmth whatsoeverâ€¦. my monitor showed the bright green and it definitely arrived. Bright vibrant green after I washed it. It was still bright vibrant green that shows me the quality, & I ordered large after washing. It did not shrink at all, it fits perfectly, actually loose fitting so I might be able to throw in the dryer on low heat for second washing. Love ðŸ’š Read more
items.author: BNStyle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering Fit and Super Versatile
items.body: I love this sweater vest! The fabric feels soft and comfortable, with just the right amount of stretch. Itâ€™s lightweight but still warm enough to layer over a blouse or long-sleeve shirt, making it perfect for both work and casual outfits. The sleeveless design gives it a chic, modern look, and the fit is flattering without being too tight. Iâ€™ve already received compliments every time Iâ€™ve worn it. Great quality for the price, and definitely a versatile piece to have in your wardrobe! Read more
items.author: AmandaB

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: True to size. And really cute, Only fault is amish the sleeves were either shorter or longer, it falls in a weird spot on me. Otherwise great quality and a good thickness. Read more
items.author: Jewels:)

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great top!
items.body: Thin, yet densely knit top that is perfect for the office! The material is soft, high quality, for a great price! I wish there were more color options and I would buy all of them. 5'4" and 130lb with muscular shoulders, a small was perfect. I thought it would look boxy, but the capped sleeve sat nice on my arms. The only draw back is that the arm hold are slightly to large and I needed a tank to layer underneath. Read more
items.author: s

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is nice.
items.body: I Like this sweater. I wore it with a long sleeve floral mesh top and it was cute. I do wish it was a little less fitted though. since I am a plus size I am not huge on most fitted items. Read more
items.author: tylar

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Arm holes are huge.
items.body: This top is really, darling, lightweight fits great. Unfortunately, I have to send it back because the arm holes are huge, you can totally see bra. You can wear something under it, but I really didnâ€™t want to have to do that. I ordered the Small. For reference, Iâ€™m 5 feet tall and 128-130lbs. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, Comfy, and Feels Luxe
items.body: This top fits true to size with a relaxed, loose fit thatâ€™s both flattering and incredibly comfortable. The fabric feels so soft and smooth against the skinâ€”like something youâ€™d find at a much higher price point. Itâ€™s the kind of piece you can easily dress up or down, and it drapes beautifully without clinging. Iâ€™m really impressed with the quality and how versatile it is! Read more
items.author: Maribel

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red Stripe, Light Coffee, Apricot, Army Green, Apricot-floral, Black, Coffee, Brown Leopard, Pink, White, Khaki Stripe, Gray Stripe, White-floral, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
